translations: n.退绕；[生物物理]解旋，循环
v.解开；使松弛（unwind 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 解旋, 退绕, 退卷, 解开
栈展开, 堆栈辗转开解, 堆栈解退, 叠辗转开解
解螺旋酶, 解链酶, 翻译
事事没有绝对, 在这漫漫长路, 慢慢你会知道

sentences.sentence: It's the latest turn in the unwinding of one of the most audacious promises of the 20th century.
sentences.translation: 这是20世纪最大胆的承诺之一的最新转折。

sentences.sentence: But this isn't unwinding the stack (not yet at least).
sentences.translation: 然而这并不是堆栈展开(unwinding the stack)(至少现在不是)。

sentences.sentence: This dramatic resurgence of unemployment is unwinding the clock.
sentences.translation: 失业的大幅反弹来势汹汹。
